Desc.entry: A registered charity providing a citywide service which works with women and men from all backgrounds including black and minority ethnic groups who are experiencing any type of domestic abuse whether they are still in an abusive relationship, attempting to leave or have already left. Provides a flexible and responsive early stage service in a range of community settings and provides support concerning the needs of children involved. Offers advice, support and signposting to relevant services dependant on individual needs and circumstances. A registered charity. Company limited by guarantee 3013036.
